intro.title: A history of everything you copy
intro.description: Clipboard allows you to track and organize everything you copy. Instantly access your clipboard on all your devices.

feature-tracking.title: Keep track of your snippets
feature-tracking.description: Clipboard instantly stores any item you copy in the cloud, meaning you can access your snippets immediately on all your devices. Our Mac and iOS apps will help you organize everyting.

quick-search.title: Quick Search
quick-search.description: Easily search your snippets by content, category, web address, application, and more.

icloud-sync.title: iCloud Sync
icloud-sync.description: Instantly saves and syncs snippets across all your devices.

complete-history.title: Complete History
complete-history.description: Retrieve any snippets from the first moment you started using the app.

feature-accessibility.title: Access Clipboard anywhere
feature-accessibility.description: Whether you're on the go, or at your computer, you can access all your Clipboard snippets in a few simple clicks.

feature-supercharge.title: Supercharge your workflow
feature-supercharge.description: We've got the tools to boost your productivity.

create-blacklists.title: Create blacklists
create-blacklists.description: Ensure sensitive information never makes its way to your clipboard by excluding certain sources.

plain-text-snippets.title: Plain text snippets
plain-text-snippets.description: Remove unwanted formaatting from copied text for a consistent look.

sneak-preview.title: Sneak preview
sneak-preview.description: Quick preview of all snippets on your Clipboard for easy access.

feature-clipboard-devices.title: Clipboard for iOS and Mac OS
feature-clipboard-devices.description: Available for free on the App Store. Download for Mac or iOS, sync with iCloud and you're ready to start adding to your clipboard.
